entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 12:43 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure: 104.0 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -28.2°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
